gallery.title: Gynébe Clinic in Oporto
gallery.text: The Gynébe Clinic was born in 2003 in the heart of Porto as a space dedicated essentially to women's and children's health. In 2005 a second unit opened in Santo Tirso. Both clinics offer a central location with excellent accessibility on foot, by public transportation or by own car with several nearby carparks.

galleryST.title: Gynébe Clinic of Santo Tirso
galleryST.text: The Gynébe Clinic was born in 2003 in the heart of Porto as a space dedicated essentially to women's and children's health. In 2005 a second unit opened in Santo Tirso. Both clinics offer a central location with excellent accessibility on foot, by public transportation or by own car with several nearby carparks.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.first: At Gynébe Clinic all collaborators are dedicated and oriented to serve you better through a wide range of services directed to women, children and the family.
mission.second: In short, an organization specially designed to prevent and combat disease, as well as to promote quality of life, in physical and psychological terms, and always with respect for emotional sensitivity and human individuality.

bestCare.title: The Best Health Care
bestCare.second: Consultations in Portuguese, English and Spanish
bestCare.fourth: Strong human component of all professionals
bestCare.sixth: Easy access for people with reduced mobility
bestCare.seventh: Respect for individuality and personal sensitivity
bestCare.eighth: Technical differentiation of the services provided
bestCare.ninth: Location in the heart of Oporto city
bestCare.tenth: Comprehensive women's, child, and family health services
bestCare.eleventh: Recognition of the services provided by our users
bestCare.twelfth: Agreements and Partnerships with most conventions

mb.name: Dra. Marta Baltar
mb.illnessesItems: Anxiety or depression, sleep issues, marital issues, postpartum depression, Infertility, parental difficulties, separation and divorce
mb.appointmentItems: Clinical Psychology Appointments - Psychology Remote appointment
mb.areasOfDifferentiationItems: Psychotherapeutic intervention in children, youth and adults

clinicalActivity.title: Clinical Activity
clinicalActivity.l1: She works in the field of Clinical and Health Psychology in psychometric diagnosis, psycho-pedagogical and psychotherapeutic monitoring of children, youth and adults in the Clinical Psychology Office.
clinicalActivity.l2: Since 2006, she is responsible for the Psychology Consultation at the Gynébe Clinic. Within the Psychology Consultation, and in collaboration with the professionals working in this clinic, she has developed psychological assessment/intervention activities for children, youth and adults at risk due to emotional and/or learning problems, parenting disorders, infertility problems in couples, postpartum depression, sexual and marital problems, separation and divorce.
clinicalActivity.l3: Worked in the field of Child and Youth Clinical Psychology in psychometric diagnosis, psychotherapeutic and psycho-pedagogical follow-up at the Marco de Canaveses Medical-Surgical Clinic (1989-1990).
clinicalActivity.l4: Participated in the Interministerial Program for the Promotion of Educational Success in Basic Education (Ministry of Education), being the modalities of action and its evaluation in the field of psycho-pedagogical stimulation of the community, teaching agents, parents and students (1988-1992).
clinicalActivity.l5: Specialty training in Psychotherapy: 2nd year of the Post-Graduation Course by the Portuguese Society of Clinical Psychology (1991-1993).

academicEducation.title: Academic Background
academicEducation.l1: PhD in Psychology from the Faculty of Psychology and Education Sciences of the University of Porto, in 2005.
academicEducation.l2: Master's degree in Psychopathology and Clinical Psychology from Instituto Superior de Psicologia Aplicada, in 1998.
academicEducation.l3: Degree in Psychology from the Faculty of Psychology and Education Sciences of the University of Lisbon.

scientificActivity.title: Scientific Activity
scientificActivity.l1: Several research works, communications and publications of national scope.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.p1: Your privacy is important to us. It is Gynébe Clinic's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect about you at our website
privacy.name: Clínica Gynébe
privacy.p2: , and other sites that we own and operate.
privacy.p3: We request personal information only when we actually need it to provide you with a service. We do so by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent.
privacy.p4: We only retain information collected for as long as it is necessary to provide the requested service. When we store data, we protect it within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.
privacy.p5: We do not share personally identifiable information publicly or with third parties except as required by law.
privacy.p6: Our website may have links to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites and cannot accept responsibility for their respective
privacy.p7: Anyone is free to refuse our request for personal information, on the understanding that we may not be able to provide some of the services desired.
privacy.p8: Your continued use of our website will be deemed acceptance of our practices around privacy and personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, please contact us.
privacy.subtitle: User Commitment
privacy.p9: The user undertakes to make appropriate use of the contents and information that the Gynébe Clinic offers on the website and with an enunciative, but not limitative, character:

p10.l1: A) Do not engage in activities that are illegal or contrary to good faith and public order;
p10.l2: B) Do not spread propaganda or content of a racist, xenophobic nature, or online gambling, games of chance, any kind of illegal pornography, apology for terrorism or against human rights;
p10.l3: C) Not to cause damage to the physical (hardware) and logical (software) systems of the Gynébe Clinic, its suppliers or third parties, to introduce or disseminate computer viruses or any other hardware or software systems that are capable of causing the aforementioned damage.

privacy.p11: Hopefully that is clear, and as mentioned earlier, if there is something you are not sure whether you need or not, it is generally safer to leave cookies enabled if you interact with one of the features you use on our site.

specialties.title: Our Services
specialties.text: The Gynébe Clinic is characterized by the quality of its clinical staff, the technical differentiation of the services provided and the strong human component and commitment of all professionals to the satisfaction and well-being of the patient. The Gynébe Clinic is characterized by its dynamism and constant innovation and updating of scientific knowledge, allied to the availability of advanced technology, adapted to the provision of personalized and differentiated health care. In this clinic there is a close inter-relationship with other clinical areas and medical specialties, allowing, whenever necessary, multidisciplinary consultation, with study and treatment of the patient's various pathologies, fully integrated.

gyne.title: Gynecology
gyne.text: Regular gynecological follow-up from adolescence through menopause is essential in the prevention and treatment of gynecological and sexually transmitted diseases, as well as gynecological cancer screening.
gyne.list1: Family Planning/Contraception (including IUD and implant insertion and removal)

obs.title: Obstetrics
obs.text: Obstetrics does the follow-up from pre-conception to postpartum, in normal situations and with pathology.
obs.text2: Obstetrics encompasses a wide area of care, such as:
obs.list9: Accompaniment during Normal, Instrumental and Surgical Delivery

ped.title: Pediatrics
ped.text: Pediatrics follows the newborn from birth through early adulthood. Regular follow-up in Pediatrics aims at the healthy growth and promotion of the physical and psychological well-being of children and adolescents, acting with preventive and curative character.
ped.text2: Pediatrics encompasses a wide area, such as:
ped.list1: Healthy and adequate growth and development
ped.list4: Diagnosis and therapeutic decision of pathological situations
ped.list5: Identification of cases requiring multidisciplinary intervention with other clinical areas

endo.title: Endocrinology
endo.text: Endocrinology is the medical specialty dedicated to the diagnosis and treatment of disorders of the endocrine system, composed of the hormone-producing glands responsible for normal development, reproduction, and metabolism.
endo.text2: The thyroid, pancreas, pituitary glands, adrenals, parathyroid glands, ovaries, and testes are the best known endocrine glands, but bone and adipose tissue also play an important role in the production of hormones.
endo.text3: The situations that most bring the patient to the practise are:

psy.title: Psychology
psy.text3: The Psychotherapeutic Intervention of children, youth and adults in situations of:

nut.title: Nutrition
nut.text: In our nutrition appointments, the nutritional needs are evaluated and the dietary planning is customized to each individual situation and specific goal.
nut.text2: Learning to have healthy eating habits, in addition to weight loss, aims at improving the quality of physical and emotional life, as well as the most diverse pathologies.
nut.text3: Nutritionists work closely with other health professionals and in particular with endocrinology.
